BossScene.name: Alfred
dialog: Hello there!
Thanks for saving me!
I will now return to the village. Visit me in the forest north of the portal sometimes!

BossScene.name: Willy Willsonton
dialog: Hello Sir!
Thank you for killing this creature and therefore rescueing me.
I will leave you for now. Visit me at the town hall located in the middle of the village.

BossScene.name: Kory Willsonton
dialog: Thank you for saveing me!
My father is propably worried about me so I will leave you now!
Visit me in the town hall's garden!

BossScene.name: Paskel
dialog: Hey there mate!
Have my thanks!
I will return to my fields now. My house is next to the fields on the southern side of the village!

BossScene.name: Rohan
dialog: Hey there!
Thank god you saved me from these creatures!
I am still a little bit in shock but I will leave you for now!
I live next to the fields on the nothern side of the village. Come by and visit me!

BossScene.name: Breya
dialog: Hello warrior!
That was quite a fight!
I am really exhausted... I will return to the village.
Come visit me at sometime. You can find me on a bench south of the smith!

BossScene.name: Agama
dialog: Hello my dear!
Thanks for saveing me and my baby!
I was so afraid that I would never see the sun again.
I will go back to the village now! Visit me at the house south west of the village!

BossScene.name: Vale
dialog: Hello...
I will go now... I have nothing to say to you.

BossScene.name: Igor
dialog: Greetings!
Thank you son for saveing me!
I am too old for beeing kidnapped... Everything hurts...
I will recover on a bench south of the portal - Come visit me there!

BossScene.name: Grunilde
dialog: Oh hello!
Thanks for saveing me!
I run the shop in the village so come by and visit me!
You can buy all kinds of useful items there!

BossScene.name: Hartwin
dialog: Hello fella...
I don't want to talk now! Thanks though!
I will now leave... I think I will go to the shop now - I need something to drink...

BossScene.name: Jai-Blynn Straus
dialog: ~ Here is stand, before my eyes ~
~ A nobody then, my hero arise ~
Oh... May I excuse me now - I will return to the village. Meet me in the shop!

TutorialScene.name: Ferdinand
dialog: Hello!
Huge scary portal appeared in the woods... Scary now.
Please help!
Monsters stole people... Now village empty.
Ferdinand sad now...

TutorialScene.name: Johnson
dialog: STOP!
What are your doing here?
What? You are just a traveller?
Well... I am sorry. To be honest - We are currently having a big problem in our village.
Hmm... Thats a nice sword you have here. Are you a warrior?
I am begging you - Can you visit the smith down the road?
He will tell you what happend here.

TutorialScene.name: Solaire
dialog: Hello fella!
Are you here to help?
It was pure chaos the last few hours...
How did this even happen?
It was such a beautiful day - Even the sun was shining.
You are searching the smith?
I think he is right next to the portal. Just walk further right.
... Just so you know... I am really glad that you are here.

TutorialScene.name: Alberich
dialog: Hello there!
Are you here to help? We are really in need of a helping hand.
You know... This huge portal just appeared a few hours ago.
I do not know what is happening or why it is happening.
The moment the portal materialised a horde of monsters came out und kidnapped most of our citizens.
Even the majors daughter was taken by a swarm of bats. I have never seen such creatures...
You want to help? Great!
It would be awesome if you can rescue the villagers from the fangs of the monsters!
The existence of this village is depending on you!

VillageScene.name: Ferdinand
dialog: Hmm...
Hmm?
Oh sorry. I not see you comin'.
You know... I love rocks!
I LOVE ROCKS!
If you have' talk to me. I give you reward. I found yellow stones in the woods.
Shiny rocks... But not for Ferdinand. He is me.

VillageScene.name: Alfred
dialog: Hey there!
Are you still killing those creatures?
I am happy that most of the monsters are slimes. Easy to kill you know... Well a bit slimy but still.
Imagine what would happen if other - much stronger - foes would spawn in.
Zombies would be hilarious. They would be so stupid that you could probably run in circles and they would not catch you.
I think the more important question is where the portal leads.
Only 4 different locations were discovered by now.
Imagine if you hop inside and fall out in the middle of a jungle.
This really reminds me of something...

VillageScene.name: Willy Willsonton
dialog: Hello Mr!
Thank you for rescueing me from that terrible place.
I am William Willsonton. I am the mayor of this little village.
I am afraid that I am in need of your help once again...
There are still some villagers missing! We need to help them immediately.
My lovely daugther is also among the missing people.
I am begging you... Help them!
Thanks!
But before you enter the portal again I think you are in need of better equipment.
I have the feeling that the dungeons get harder the more we fight back the monsters.
I do not have enough time to show you around - So let me hand you this map [M].
It shows our village and also all interesting locations like the smith in the north or the shop in the south.
I think the smith can craft you a better sword. His craftsmanship is well known.
In the shop you will find all kind of useful items like a good healpotion for your adventure.
Ah... and have this!
This scroll [L] shows all dungeons you can enter through the portal.
It seems like that this scroll has some sort of magic inherited.
If you are not in reach of the portal, you can select a dungeon on the scroll and it will automatically teleport you to the desired location.
It also shows the number of villagers left to rescue in the specific dungeon.
Hmm... to be honest - I don't know where I got this scroll from. It just appeared a few hours ago as if a greater force knew you would need this item.
Hmm.. Whatever...
Once again - Get yourself better equipment and fight some monsters.
The life of the villagers are in your hands!

VillageScene.name: Kory Willsonton
dialog: My hero! Welcome!
Thank you for rescueing me!
My name is Kory and I am the daugther of the mayor.
Thanks to you, all villagers are back home! Thank you for that!
To be honest - We are still not sure how exactly we will proceed with the portal.
It is still functional... So we could use its teleportation magic for something else.
Further investigations showed that the portal could potentially lead to more locations.
However, due to the limited amount of time this will only be able in the future.
But enough of that. What are your plans for the future?
I heared that you were travelling to the kingdom's captial before all of this happened.
As a matter of fact, the captial is currently faceing a much worse problem.
I think they are in need of excellent warriors! So what do your think?
But whatever you will do, let me assure you that you are always welcome in our village!
See you soon - Our hero!

VillageScene.name: Paskel
dialog: Hey there mate!
That was quite the fight back there!
Thanks - I guess...
Well... my name is Paskel and I am the farmer of this village.
This means I am in charge of these fields and the fields in the north.
However, most of the time I will stay here in the south.
You must know that I have a small brother. He takes the responsibility of the northern fields.
His name is Rohan. He is really a good guy. Well... sometimes he can really get on someone's nerves. But other than that...
You should really talk to him at some point.

VillageScene.name: Rohan
dialog: Hey there!
I am Rohan and I am the second farmer in this village.
My older brother Paskel handles the important things like buying seeds and planning for the future.
I will do the actual farming. I really like the work. It is really interesting how a big plant which provides food for everyone can grow from such little seeds.
Sure... Its hard sometimes. Especially on hot days.
The best time of the day is the evening. Normally all villagers come together in the tarvern to drink something.
Yeah.. Yeah.. I know it is not a tavern - It is a shop. But to be honest everyone uses this place as a meeting point and this makes it to a tarvern or am I wrong?
But - please - do not tell that Grunilde. She will get mad. She runs the shop so she can name her location how she wants.
Well... I need to continue with my work. See you in the tarvern... ehm... shop - You know what I mean.

VillageScene.name: Breya
dialog: Hello warrior!
Here we meet again. However, outside of the battlefield this time.
I am Breya and a warrior myself. I was really kickn ass back there.
Well... I was till I got overrun. These bastards kept coming in.
In the end I got captured and sat in that room for days.
I was really glad you showed up and helped me out of there. Thanks! I owe you something.
However, I am not done yet. There are still undiscovered secrets at the other side of the portal which wait to be revealed.
Are you coming too?

VillageScene.name: Agama
dialog: Hello my dear. I am Agama.
Thank you for saveing me and my baby!
On one hand I am really glad that my husband left the village a few weeks ago. He went to the capital to sell his goods.
He will propably need a few more days until he will make a return. At this point he has no idea what happend here.
I guess it is better that way. We would be worried and instantly came back without the revenue he could have made.
On the other hand he could have helped the others to defend our village. He is skilled with the sword so he could have made a difference.
This is how it is and we can not change the past. So I accept that this was intended to happen.

VillageScene.name: Vale
dialog: What do you want?
Leave me alone...
ehh...
My name is Vale, alright?
I was sent from the kingdom's captial to solve this problem.
Yeah, you saved me. I got overrun by powerful monsters. I could not do a thing.
Do you really want to hear it?
Fine...
Thanks...
Satisfied?
But now leave me alone. I need to prepare for my next portal visit.
I will get ahold of the situation as quick as possible and will return to the capital.
He have problems ourself and can not care about such small villages.
Now... Bye!

VillageScene.name: Igor
dialog: Greetings!
I am Igor and I am the local magician.
Well... I am trying my best to do some magic.
I only managed to summon a small flame. I know this is not much but its not easy to learn new things when you are this old.
Because of that I am especially interested in the appeared portal. Where does it come from? How does it work exactly? Who is responsible for the appearance?
These questions are waiting to be answered! And I will be the one who finds them!
Wish me luck!
One more thing... Do you have any sticks? I need a few to build me a wand.

VillageScene.name: Johnson
dialog: Hello again!
Thank you for rescueing the villagers!
My name is Johnson.
I am not skilled in useing a sword so I am pretty useless in a fight.
However, I help out as much as possible here in the village. Some people had some pretty deep wounds.
I am so glad that you walked in our village a few days ago!

VillageScene.name: Solaire
dialog: Hello fella!
Are you going back in the portal?
Hold on for a moment!
We could not really talk when you stubbled across this village a few days ago.
I am called Solaire! It is a pleasure to meet you!
I see you are well equipped - Good. If you need a new sword or a better shield go to Alberich.
He also created my equipment and what can I say... I am still alive - He He He
I don't want to keep you waiting any longer... Go ahead and kill some monsters for me, will you?
Stay save though! I don't want to find your corpse in there!

SmithScene.name: Alberich
dialog: Hello there!
I am called Alberich and I am the smith in this village!
If you are looking for a sword or shield you are lucky!
My craftsmanship is well know in the whole country!
Once I even made 3 beautiful longswords for the king's 3 children!
It would be a shame if these swords were ever used in combat...
Hmm...
Oh excuse me! I got lost in my thougths!
So what do you want?

ShopScene.name: Grunilde
dialog: Oh hello again!
Thank you for saving me back there in the cave.
I was so afraid... I thought I would never see the sunlight again!
But then you came and saved me... My hero!
I am Grunilde and I run this shop
To be honest... This shop is also used as an tavern by most of the villagers.
So go ahead and sit down by the fire or buy something from me.
You have the choice.

ShopScene.name: Hartwin
dialog: Hello fella.
Thanks for saving me.
To be honest I am still in shock...
I am called Hartwin by the way.
I am really disappointed in myself...
No really - I thought I can easily handle some monsters. I really thought that I am able to use a sword...
But the moment that huge portal appeared and the monsters came out I froze... I could not do anything.
What does it take to be as relaxed as you are?
... What? You are saying that you are also afraid while fighting?
Wow... Ok... That actually helped me a lot.
Thanks... I will think about your words for know...

ShopScene.name: Jai-Blynn Straus
dialog: ~ Plunged in night, I sit alone ~
~ Eyeless on this dungeon stone ~
~ Naked, shaggy, and unkempt, ~
~ Dreaming dreams no soul hath dreamt ~
~ Rats and vermin round my feet ~
~ Play unharmed, companions sweet; ~
~ Spiders weave me overhead ~
~ Silken curtains for my bed. ~
Yeah - that is it! ...
Oh hello my friend!
~ Here we are, we meet again ~
~ Though free, without a chain ~
I am a well known poet called Jai-Blynn Straus
Currently I am working on my latest masterpiece... The story about this village.
About the sudden appearance of a great danger.
About the vanishing of the villagers.
About the demolished houses and broken dreams.
And about your sir! How a single person saved the people in danger - About our savior!
You will hear my poem across the whole kingdom... I just need to finish this piece...
